trans-unit.source: Contains the security settings associated with a peer channel, including the type of authentication used and the security used for the message transport.
Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerSecuritySettings"></xref> class.
Gets and sets the value that indicates the security mode of the peer channel.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> enumeration value that indicates the security mode for the peer channel.
The specified value is not an enumerated value from <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>
Gets a value that indicates whether the security mode information should be serialized.

Returns <xref:System.Boolean> that specifies <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the security mode information should be serialized, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it should not be serialized..
Gets a value that indicates whether the transport information should be serialized.

Returns <xref:System.Boolean> that specifies <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the transport information should be serialized, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it should not be serialized..
Gets the value that indicates the security settings for the transport used for messages transmitted over the peer channel.
This property is set only if <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerSecuritySettings.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerTransportSecuritySettings"></xref> that contains the transport security settings for the peer channel.
